message.content:
cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
- cs.GR (Graphics): The paper proposes a system for collaborative photography using multiple mobile devices, which involves real-time visualization and feedback to guide camera positioning. This suggests a focus on graphics and visualization techniques.
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper discusses a system for capturing and editing imagery using multiple mobile devices, which suggests a focus on multimedia technologies.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper mentions synchronized capturing and real-time guidance for camera positioning, which suggests a focus on computer vision techniques.
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The paper discusses user studies and user feedback on the usability and effectiveness of the proposed system, which suggests a focus on human-computer interaction.
- cs.SD (Sound): Although not a primary focus of the paper, the proposed system could potentially involve capturing and editing audio as well as visual content, which suggests a possible connection to the sound sub-category.
